leadHunter.title: Find qualified leads in 60 seconds
leadHunter.description: Enter a sector and an area — or write in plain language. Pipelane aggregates sources, enriches (site/email/social), gives a 0–100 score and explains “Why this lead?”.
bullets: Simple criteria (industry, area, reviews, site, social)

cadences.title: Prospect without friction: Email, WhatsApp and SMS
cadences.description: Short messages (≤ 120 words). Staggered sending, best-time delivery, and a simple A/B for subject or intro.
cadences.compliance: Compliance: Email (unsubscribe), SMS (STOP), WhatsApp 24h (approved templates outside the window).

qualification.title: Qualify in 3–5 questions, book in 2 clicks
qualification.description: When a lead replies, Pipelane asks 3–5 questions, estimates intent and offers 2 time slots (or a link). The meeting is confirmed and added to your calendar/CRM.
